title: New Friend
content: The little Salamander spirit found a new person to play around with today. He had so much fun running around with a little husky today. SO CUTE!

title: Another Day of Work
content: Starting to wonder if the erason Elsa searched so hard for a way out was acutally cause she was tired of all this paperwork.

title: Snowflake
content: Since I am made of snow, does this mean that all snowflakes are my brothers and sisters? Feeling conflicted.

title: Power Couple
content: Summer is starting up soon. Good time to be an ice cutter

title: Poor Kid
content: Feel bad, Anna has to work, so Kristoff is doing the most to try and seem not lonely.. Poort kid
